name: Tower of Calamity
description:
Progress through a tower through rooms by combating enemies in a medieval fantasy setting! Beat the levels to get to the top of the tower and become the most powerful person on earth. If you die, dust yourself off and try again.

Play as three different characters and collect tarot cards during the game that makes you stronger, or if you're unlucky, not so strong.

This game was made as a first year exam project by:
Jonas Ingelstad - Lead Programmer
Andreas Hugvik - Lead Artist
Kristina Åkerman -Co-everything
Kristian Rinden - Sound and lights implementation
Martine Karlengen - Concept and cover art
